karami2023Persian.title: A transformer-based deep learning model for Persian moral sentiment analysis
karami2023Persian.author: Karami, Behnam and Bakouie, Fatemeh and Gharibzadeh, Shahriar
karami2023Persian.paperMotivationText: Moral expressions in online communications can have a serious impact on framing discussions and subsequent online behaviours. Despite research on extracting moral sentiment from English text, other low-resource languages, such as Persian, lack enough resources and research about this important topic.
karami2023Persian.paperContributionText: A model which can be used as a tool for analysing moral sentiment and framing in Persian texts for downstream social and psychological studies
karami2023Persian.paperResultsText: The findings indicate that using a combination of dictionary based methods and ML models yield reasonable results for the task of predicting moral values for Persian tweets. Specifically, fine-tuning the BERT model produces striking results.
